findings.neck: No evidence of recurrence in the surgical bed.
findings.breast: Small partially calcified nodule in the left breast is unchanged since ___.
findings.upper_abdomen: Moderate sliding hiatal hernia is unchanged.
findings.mediastinum: Few sub centimeter lymph nodes are not pathologically enlarged.

heart.findings: Moderate cardiomegaly with trace pericardial effusion, unchanged since ___.
heart.changes: Left ventricle and left atrium have enlarged since ___.

findings.pulmonary: Small right and left tiny pleural effusions associated with mild adjacent compressive atelectasis. No evidence of consolidation to suggest pneumonia.
findings.skeletal: Heterogeneous appearance of the skeleton with diffuse sclerotic and lytic appearance associated with several vertebral wedge fractures is grossly unchanged in comparison to the PET-CT dated ___.
findings.rib_fractures: Multiple healing or healed bilateral rib fractures, no clear evidence of acute fracture.
